title: Fruit and Chocolate Pancake Cake
ingredients: ['280g self-raising flour', '280g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '500ml milk', '4 eggs', '20g cocoa powder', '100g white chocolate', '620ml cream', '20g icing sugar', '20g arrowroot', '425g tinned fruit (e.g. cherries, strawberries etc.)', '200g milk chocolate']
